about.subtitle: PIONEERING THE FUTURE OF INTELLIGENT ENERGY OPERATIONS
about.title: Sirius: PETRONAS' Revolutionary <highlight>GIS-Powered Platform</highlight>
about.description: Sirius represents a paradigm shift in energy sector digitalization—a cutting-edge geospatial intelligence platform that transforms how PETRONAS explores, develops, and optimizes global energy assets. By converging advanced AI, machine learning, and real-time analytics with comprehensive geological and operational data, Sirius empowers decision-makers with unprecedented insights that drive sustainable growth and operational excellence.
about.description2: Built on Fortune 500-grade cloud architecture and powered by Microsoft Azure, Sirius seamlessly integrates Esri's industry-leading ArcGIS ecosystem with PETRONAS' proprietary data intelligence frameworks. This enterprise-scale platform processes over 2.5 petabytes of subsurface data, enabling real-time visualization of complex geological formations, reservoir dynamics, and asset performance metrics across our entire upstream portfolio.
about.techStack: Sirius harnesses Microsoft Azure's enterprise cloud infrastructure, Esri's ArcGIS platform, and cutting-edge AI technologies to deliver world-class geospatial intelligence that powers data-driven decisions across PETRONAS' global operations.
about.executiveInsight: Sirius has revolutionized our upstream operations, establishing PETRONAS as a global leader in digital energy transformation. This platform has accelerated our exploration success rate by 40%, reduced operational costs by $2.3 billion annually, and enabled us to identify new reserves worth over $15 billion. Most importantly, Sirius is helping us achieve our Net Zero Carbon Emissions by 2050 commitment through optimized field development and enhanced operational efficiency.
